document.full_text: the supreme court unanimously ruled that a man detained after the sept. 11 attacks may not sue john d. ashcroft for misusing the federal material-witness law.
document.title: justices block suit over use of material witness law against detainee
lines_and_colors: the supreme court unanimously ruled that a man detained after the sept. 11 attacks may not sue john d. ashcroft for misusing the federal material-witness law.
